channel.title: CVE Feed for VMware -- Spring
channel.description: The latest CVEs for VMware -- Spring

item.title: CVE-2024-38820|2024-10-18T16:33:56.342Z -- vmware -- spring
item.description: The fix for CVE-2022-22968 made disallowedFields patterns in DataBinder case insensitive. However, String.toLowerCase() has some Locale dependent exceptions that could potentially result in fields not protected as expected.
